TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Recep_Tayyip_Erdoğan, title = Recep_Tayyip_Erdoğan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Recep_Tayyip_Erdoğan} }

S.FORM: I 1954 a miheca saka 2 folad saka 26 a romi'ad masofoc ci Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Turkey anini i ci Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 8 folad saka 28 a romi'ad.

I 1954 a miheca saka 2 folad saka 26 a romi'ad masofoc ci Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Torkey anini i ci Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 8 folad saka 28 a romi'ad.
